mapper.select: SELECT BKUP_ID/*백업ID 확인 */ , PRJT_ID/*프로젝트ID */ , PGM_ID/*프로그램ID */ , BZCD/*업무구분 */ , SQN_CD/*차수 */ , SCNR_ID/*시나리오ID*/ , SCNR_NM/*시나리오명*/ , TST_CASE_ID , TST_CASE_NM , FRCS_STA_DT , FRCS_END_DT , DVLPE_CNF_DT , PL_CNF_DT , DVLPE_ENO , PL_ENO , CRPE_ENO , ITG_TST_PRC_CD , PRR_CND , INP_VAL , TST_DES , OUP_VAL , TP , OUP_MENS , PGM_ID , SCRN_ID , TRN_CD , RQU_SBH_ID , TST_RST , TST_ACHI_RST , RMRK , ATFL_MNG_ID , OPR_NO , DB_CHG_TS FROM pms_itg_tst_mng WHERE 1=1
